text: Arpit, Grace, and Adam presented at the annual GVU research showcase.
Arpit Narechania presented "Facilitating Conversational Interaction in Natural Language Interfaces for Visualization" at IEEE VIS 2022.
Grace Guo presented her research at the Doctoral Colloquium for IEEE VIS 2022.
Our lab attended the IEEE VIS 2022 conference in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, USA!
